price: Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene no asomfoͻ no ne wͻn a wͻde ahobraseε nam asaase soͻ; sε abagyimifoͻ no bi (de kasa bͻne bi) kasa wͻn ho a, deε wͻka ne sε: “Asomdweε”,
arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمۡشُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هَوۡنٗا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ قَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waʿibādu al-raḥmāni alladhīna yamshūna ʿalā al-arḍi hawnan wa-idhā khāṭabahumu al-jāhilūna qālū salāman
